uk.org.openseizuredetector.locator

Class LocationFinder2

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.org.openseizuredetector.locator.LocationFinder2

  • public class LocationFinder2
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Graham Jones Based on various examples from the internet. Call with LocationFinder lf = new LocationFinder(this); LonLat ll = lf.getLocationLL(); where 'this' must implement the LocationReceiver interface.
